mapper.select: select c.*, to_char(date_of_establishment, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as doe from company c where comp_id = #{compId} and del_flag = 'N'
select * from humanresources where comp_id = #{compId} order by enrolldate
select * from sales where comp_id = #{compId} order by year desc
mapper.update: update humanresources set name = #{name}, department = #{department}, position = #{position}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} where comp_Id = #{compId} and no = #{no}
update sales set sales=#{sales} where comp_id=#{compId} and year=#{year}
mapper.delete: delete from sales where comp_id=#{compId} and year=#{year}
mapper.select: select * from location where comp_id=#{compId} order by name
mapper.update: update location set name=#{name}, address=#{address}, add_address=#{addAddress}, etc=#{etc} where comp_id=#{compId} and no=#{no}
mapper.select: select m.*, (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-substr(birth,1,4))+1 age, (select count(*) from favorites where comp_id=#{compId} and member_id=#{memberId} and select_no=1) count from member m where member_id=#{memberId}

select r.*, (select count(*) from companyapplication where recruitment_no=r.recruitment_no) count, (select count(*) from companyapplication where recruitment_no=r.recruitment_no and read='N') not_read_count from recruitment r where comp_id=#{compId} and end='N'
select member_id from companyapplication where recruitment_no=#{recruitment_no}
select * from recruitment where recruitment_no=#{recruitmentNo} and end='N'
select * from recruitment where comp_id=#{compId} and not recruitment_no=#{recruitmentNo} and end='N'
select * from recruitment where comp_id=#{compId} and end='Y'
mapper.update: update recruitment set end='Y' where recruitment_no=#{recruitmentNo}
